languages.text: "Веабос-6 стал твоим чудовищным отражением. Муки других — это часть твоего собственного наказания, потому что ты устал от насилия. Устал казнить".
"Vheabos VI has become your twisted reflection. Others' torment is part of your own punishment. You have grown tired of violence, tired of carrying out executions."
languages.original_text: "Веабос-6 стал твоим чудовищным отражением. Муки других — это часть твоего собственного наказания, потому что ты устал от насилия. Устал казнить".

traits.locale_text: "Vheabos VI has become your twisted reflection. The others' torment is part of your own punishment because you are have grown tired of violence. Tired of carrying out executions."
"Vheabos VI has become your twisted reflection. The others' torment is part of your own punishment because you are have grown tired of violence. Tired of carrying out executions."
"Vheabos VI has become your twisted reflection. The others' torment is part of your own punishment because you are have grown tired of violence tired of carrying out executions."
"Vheabos VI has become your twisted reflection. The others' torment is part of your own punishment because you are have grown tired of violence tired of carrying out executions."
"Vheabos VI has become your twisted reflection. Others' torment is part of your own punishment. You have grown tired of violence, tired of carrying out executions."
"Vheabos VI has become your twisted reflection. Others' torment is part of your own punishment. You have grown tired of violence, tired of carrying out executions."

languages.text: 「ヴィアボス・VIは君の歪んだ鏡だ。他の者の苦しみが君の罰の一部なんだ。君は暴力に疲れ、処刑を執行することに疲れてしまった」
languages.original_text: "Vheabos VI has become your twisted reflection. Others' torment is part of your own punishment. You have grown tired of violence, tired of carrying out executions."

traits.locale_text: 「ヴィアボス・VIは君の歪んだ鏡だ。他の者の苦しみが君の罰の一部なんだ。君は暴力に疲れ、処刑を執行することに疲れてしまった」

languages.text: "Vheabos-VI ist zu Eurem verzerrten Spiegelbild geworden. Die Qual anderer ist jetzt ein Teil Eurer eigenen Strafe. Ihr seid der Gewalt müde, wollt keine Hinrichtungen mehr durchführen."
languages.original_text: "Vheabos VI has become your twisted reflection. Others' torment is part of your own punishment. You have grown tired of violence, tired of carrying out executions."

traits.locale_text: "Vheabos-VI ist zu Eurem verzerrten Spiegelbild geworden. Die Qual anderer ist jetzt ein Teil Eurer eigenen Strafe. Ihr seid der Gewalt müde, wollt keine Hinrichtungen mehr durchführen."

languages.text: « Vhéabos-VI est devenue un reflet déformé de vous-même. Vous tourmentez les autres afin de vous punir vous-même. Vous êtes las de recourir à la violence et d'ordonner toutes ces exécutions. »
languages.original_text: "Vheabos VI has become your twisted reflection. Others' torment is part of your own punishment. You have grown tired of violence, tired of carrying out executions."

traits.locale_text: « Vhéabos-VI est devenue un reflet déformé de vous-même. Vous tourmentez les autres afin de vous punir vous-même. Vous êtes las de recourir à la violence et d'ordonner toutes ces exécutions. »

languages.text: «Vheabos VI se ha convertido en un reflejo distorsionado de usted mismo. El sufrimiento ajeno forma parte de su castigo personal. Se ha cansado de la violencia, de las ejecuciones sumarias».
languages.original_text: "Vheabos VI has become your twisted reflection. Others' torment is part of your own punishment. You have grown tired of violence, tired of carrying out executions."

traits.locale_text: «Vheabos VI se ha convertido en un reflejo distorsionado de usted mismo. El sufrimiento ajeno forma parte de su castigo personal. Se ha cansado de la violencia, de las ejecuciones sumarias».

languages.text: “维博斯六号星已经成为了你扭曲的倒影，其他人的苦难也成为了你自我惩罚的一部分。你已经厌倦了暴力，厌倦了执行死刑。”
languages.original_text: "Vheabos VI has become your twisted reflection. Others' torment is part of your own punishment. You have grown tired of violence, tired of carrying out executions."

traits.locale_text: “维博斯六号星已经成为了你扭曲的倒影，其他人的苦难也成为了你自我惩罚的一部分。你已经厌倦了暴力，厌倦了执行死刑。”

languages.text: "Vheabos VI senin çarpık bir yansıman hâline geldi. Diğerlerinin işkencesi, senin kendi cezanın bir parçası. Şiddetten ve insanları infaz etmekten sıkıldın."
languages.original_text: "Vheabos VI has become your twisted reflection. Others' torment is part of your own punishment. You have grown tired of violence, tired of carrying out executions."

traits.locale_text: "Vheabos VI senin çarpık bir yansıman hâline geldi. Diğerlerinin işkencesi, senin kendi cezanın bir parçası. Şiddetten ve insanları infaz etmekten sıkıldın."
